definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
to wave/to brandish/to command/to conduct/to scatter/to disperse
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: Yoda, acting as general, oversaw the battle from the forward command center.
sentences.chinese: 尤达担任统帅，在前线指挥中心督战。

sentences.english: A worker is screened for radiation before entering the emergency operation center at the nuclear plant.
sentences.chinese: 进入应急指挥中心前，工作人员接受核辐射检查。

sentences.english: The Wallops Flight Facility command center.
sentences.chinese: 基金的沃洛普斯飞行指挥中心。

sentences.english: And destroy enemy command center if nece ary .
sentences.chinese: 如有必要捣毁敌指挥中心。

sentences.english: Employees of the Tokyo Electric Power Company work at the emergency operation center at the nuclear plant.
sentences.chinese: 东京电力公司职员在核电站应急指挥中心工作。

sentences.english: Bastrop Convention Center was temporarily converted into relief command center.
sentences.chinese: 巴斯特罗普会展中心被临时改作救灾指挥中心。

sentences.english: Xujiahui is the command center, the Bund is the front.
sentences.chinese: 徐家汇是指挥中心，外滩是前沿阵地。

sentences.english: The city is a regional command center for the Chinese military, one of seven in the country.
sentences.chinese: 济南是中国军队的地区性指挥中心，七大军区之一。

sentences.english: We were welcomed by Mr. Yow-ming Bih, Director of the dispatch centre.
sentences.chinese: 得到救灾救护指挥中心的毕幼明主任热烈欢迎。

sentences.english: A full multinational complement would be reached within 20 days.
sentences.chinese: 一个完整多国指挥中心可运作达到20天。

sentences.english: The command center is used to direct each control units to work together.
sentences.chinese: 指挥中心负责指挥各个操控台进行协同工作。

definition: group/a large body of/production brigade/military group
(of police, fire brigade etc) to receive a report of an incident
to dispatch police to the scene of crime, accident etc
to sound an alarm/to report sth to the police
to be on duty (of a security guard etc)
public security bureau (government office similar in function to a police station)
